installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt-get update -y && apt-get install -y git curl 
cd /mnt/server 
git clone https://github.com/Joshua-Herbert088/tailscale-egg.git . 
chmod +x ./*.sh 
./install.sh 
echo "Install complete"

variables.name: Tailscale Auth Key
variables.description: Tailscale auth key for this node (from Tailscale admin console).
